name: Salesforce Embedded Login Example
description: An end-to-end example of Salesforce Embedded Log In, leveraging the Salesforce Identity for Customers (CIAM) product

APP_ID.description: The Consumer Key of your Salesforce Connected App

APP_SECRET.description: The Consumer Secret of your Salesforce Connected App

COMMUNITY_URL.description: The URL to your community, without any trailing characters.

OAUTH_CALLBACK_URL.description: The URL to your Heroku app's callback, without any trailing characters.

HOSTED_APP_URL.description: The URL to your Heroku app, without any trailing characters.

BG_FAKE.description: The URL to your community, without any trailing characters.

STATIC_ASSET_URL.description: The URL to your hosted version of sfdc_authmagic.js from the repo.
